short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A website blocker to help you to keep focused

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block websites in a variety of unique ways to boost your productivity and reclaim your free time.

Block distracting websites with a variety of custom blockers. Use Super Custom Blocker to customize the type of blocker.

Default blockers: 
      - Provide a reason: Why are you using this site?
      - Timer: Wait 30 seconds if you really want to use this site.
      - Definitive: No, this site is disabled.
      - Pattern: That fun phone unlocking pattern but for distracting sites.

Created by Agency Enterprise - ae.studio
